headline: 131st Common Stock Monthly Dividend Increase Declared by Realty Income
summary: Realty Income Corporation (Realty Income, NYSE: O), The Monthly Dividend Company®, today announced it has declared an increase in the company's common stock monthly cash dividend to $0.2690 per share from $0.2685 per share. The dividend is payable on July 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of July 1, 2025. The new monthly dividend represents an annualized dividend amount of $3.228 per share as compared to the prior annualized dividend amount of $3.222 per share.

headline: I'm Buying Up To 10% Yields For Recurring Income
summary: Investors may want to focus on the payback period and high-yield income when looking at dividend stocks. Read about two investments that can deliver strong recurring income.

headline: Agree Realty: Crown Jewel Of My REIT Portfolio On Hold
summary: Agree Realty excels with strong AFFO growth, top-tier tenants, and dividend safety. See why ADC stock's high valuation suggests a 'Hold' for near-term returns.
